title: Bang Bang Long Chudong season6
title_japanese: 帮帮龙出动 第六季
synopsis: In the vast and boundless universe, there are all kinds of magical beings. Dinosaurs are the strangest kind of life. Hundreds of millions of years ago, dinosaurs also lived on the earth. Children are full of curiosity about this magical creature like dinosaurs. Everyone hopes to get close to dinosaurs and explore the mysteries of prehistoric creatures. When one day, dreams become reality and dinosaurs and humans live on the same land, what interesting stories will happen? The planet Mululu is no longer suitable for survival because of the volcanic eruption, so the dinosaurs came to the earth to live with humans with the help of Bangbanglong team. Bangbanglong Town is such a small town where humans and dinosaurs live together. . When dinosaurs and humans have frictions and difficulties, they will help the dragon team to resolve them one by one. (translated from baidu baike)
